Action:
Authorize in Zenith stage: [Zenith (digitalzenith.io)|https://www.stage.digitalzenith.io/candidates] with your Zenith Account:

Credentials for testing:
email: [gbr.templates.admin@digitalzenith.io|mailto:gbr.templates.admin@digitalzenith.io]
password: Odin2024\!

This account should have the UK primary remit and admin role.

And *click the "Submit" button.*

!xray-attachment://0d9906f8-b69f-468c-915a-8c16dffcc666|width=442,height=545!
Expected Result: The user is successfully authenticated.

Action:
Click on the "*Admin Centre"* icon.


!xray-attachment://36dfeef7-f06f-415c-9047-3073472fcb3c|width=1918,height=947!
Expected Result:
The Admin Centre page will open.
On the page will be opened by default the "Email Template" tab.
This tab will be represented in these columns: "Template Name", "File Actions", "Recipient", "Country", "Created by", and "Created Date".
Near the Created Date will be the *"NEW EMAIL TEMPLATE +"* button.
On the button of the page will be a pagination of this tab.

!xray-attachment://2d166fca-b216-400a-bf23-51290b29a596|width=1831,height=866!

Action:
Click on the *"DOCUMENT TEMPLATES"* tab.

!xray-attachment://a2ef7a80-f4f5-4bc7-9066-87e6bda96dfb|width=1817,height=851!
Expected Result:
This tab will be represented in these columns: "Template Name", "File Actions", "Country", "Created by", and "Created Date".
Near the Created Date will be the *"NEW DOCUMENT TEMPLATE +"* button.
On the button of the page will be a pagination of this tab.

!xray-attachment://c72e288f-e17f-4d50-a314-74b6d698d9fe|width=1849,height=866!

Action:
Click on the button "*NEW DOCUMENT TEMPLATE +"* 

!xray-attachment://ee845654-13be-45fd-aeb0-d898de066138|width=275,height=94!
Expected Result:
Upon initiation, the system will navigate to the '*Create New Document Template*' page. By default, the 'Information' tab will be active, displaying General Information, including the following fields:

* Template Name (mandatory)
* Created by (pre-filled, non-editable)
* Country (mandatory, it’s a drop-down list where the user can choose from the United Kingdom and Ireland, by default the United Kingdom will be selected)
* Category (mandatory, drop down where user can select the: Candidate Registration, General, Key Information Document, Temporary Booking Documentation, Terms & Conditions- listed alphabetically)
* "CREATE" button.
* "CANCEL" button.

!xray-attachment://5afd2166-91a4-41da-8903-d18dc9460896|width=1908,height=934!

Action: Add for the "*Template Name*" field this text: "_Test Document Template - Umbrella"._
Expected Result:
In the "Template Name" field will be indicated this text: "_Test Document Template - Umbrella_"

!xray-attachment://33760dd7-e047-44fb-ba2e-49db913c9db7|width=1553,height=91!

Click on the "Category" drop-down and select the "Temporary Booking Documentation".

For the Category will be selected "Temporary Booking Documentation"

!xray-attachment://d26cde10-cc06-4e11-bf8e-323ecf52f267|width=808,height=73!

And under will appear "Contract Type" that will have the possibility to select from the "Limited Company" (selected by default) Umbrella, PAYE.

!xray-attachment://257970ef-6eb5-4389-b85a-68106be8e3e9|width=344,height=104!

!xray-attachment://c9d937ca-61f3-4b0c-95c0-93e275aebb4e|width=787,height=187!

The United Kingdom will be selected by default for the Country field.

!xray-attachment://7c086343-3d6a-406e-92c0-5f543062b62d|width=802,height=157!

The contract type will be selected "Umbrella".

!xray-attachment://4e2425cb-ff68-4c94-973a-408547ebc1cd|width=350,height=122!

Action:
Click on the "*CONTENT*" tab.

!xray-attachment://596abd0a-065f-4b50-9789-799eb502a3c3|width=353,height=72!
Expected Result:
The '*CONTENT*' tab will open.

The page will include a placeholder search, categorized options for user selection, and a list of placeholders that can be copied or moved within the CKEditor. 

The Content section will represent the CKEditor interface.
On the bottom of the page will be buttons ‘CANCEL’ and ‘CREATE’.

!xray-attachment://66910aa2-6743-4c16-85f0-ed6dbf0c1e68|width=1912,height=941!

Expected Result:
"General" category will be selected and in the "Name" placeholder list will appear all the general palceholders:
It will show the agreement-date and current_date placeholder.


!xray-attachment://b4c41884-df89-4957-845b-3f8ac59e7b44|width=358,height=595!

Copy the current date placeholder and past it in the content body.

!xray-attachment://e5f366c3-e018-42c5-9afc-4099d3489f41|width=300,height=54!

In the email body will be inserted the current date placeholder it will be shown like this: "\{\{current_date}}".

*Then* I should see the *New Document modal* containing the following information/components:

New Document (title)

Please fill in the relevant fields below:

Activity:

* Selected Activity field
** the selected activity will be prepopulated and disabled

Document details:

* Contract Type - dropdown (Limited Company, Umbrella, PAYE)
** default position = Limited Company
(If the user login with an account that had the primary remit IRL the Umbrella option will disappear)

Content

* Document type - mandatory drop-down field.
On the bottom of the modal page will be "CANCEL" and "CREATE&DOWNLOAD" buttons.

*Then* the relevant document templates that have been created in Amine Centre and Document Templates have:

* the Umbrella contract type.
* the Temporary Booking Documentation category.

In the Content will be added the name of the selected Document Template.
Will appear a new compartment:

File Name *(NEW)*

* File Name - mandatory text field.

Create & Download CTA *(NEW)*

 *And* the File Name field will:

* Prepopulate with the name of the candidate linked to the selected activity (i.e. John Smith) + the stored file name/name of the template. 
* Be an editable text field so that users can update or change the file name.

!xray-attachment://5ef50d6c-c87d-4420-9f22-08ba82905756|width=1896,height=974!

Click on the "Enable Editing" button.

!xray-attachment://dfc3a081-d9a9-4e18-9631-183c323a440e|width=179,height=49!
Expected Result:
All the options for editing will become enabled in the word.
Users will see the information added int eh document, the branding images, and the placeholder being converted in today's date.

!xray-attachment://36c6e806-eebe-42d1-91ea-ab8294c00946|width=1054,height=805!

Action: Edit the document template in word then save it.
Expected Result: The changes made to the document template in Word are successfully saved.
